name: Finger the Balance
description:
If you don't keep your finger balance, objects will dance on your finger.

You can put anything on your finger.
Broccoli, bicycle, even the Statue of Liberty.

Keep objects on your fingers for a set period of time.
Your balance is more important than anything!

Game features:
- Immersion and Addictive
- Funny Objects
- Various traps to prevent keep balance
- Easy and simple control
